cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on April 21, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1488, Global Electoral Exchange Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 39 (Tuesday, March 2, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CASTRO of Texas:
H.R. 1488.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H1014]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: Global Electoral Exchange Act of 2021
